link.title: Haleyville City Schools

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/kp31txlRCoZ95GKZ2CnYCxBO-CG_w0Bjw_DVeCBKUkQ7vwq62n6T-gSg7Tg8cWZ57LII0naG=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h2: SERVE with Pride, LEAD with Confidence, INSPIRE to Impact Others

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Haleyville City Board of Education will hold its monthly regularly scheduled board meeting Tuesday, April 28, 2020, at 5:00p.m. by phone with all board members. The board will not hold a working session this month.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: Haleyville High School's Alabama Association of School Board's Road to Success 1st Place Video Created by Jon Luke Sauls
